title: 幾日前發生嘅中共趕走美國記者命令係包括香港，有冇人助我一臂之力打國際線?

replies.msg:
唔知各位係咪咁快唔記得左
幾日之前(3月17日)，支那口交部驅逐左紐約時報、華爾街日報、華盛頓郵報嘅記者
重點係今次嘅驅逐令係包括香港!
呢件事雖然睇落好似冇咩野，但其實可以係用黎打國際線嘅子彈！國際社會仍然會覺得香港o係基本法嘅保障下係享有高度自治
當然我地香港人經歷左咁多野之後都知一國兩制係乜料
不過今次中共擺到明破壞一國兩制就真係重未試過，咁我地唔通唔利用今次嘅事件打國際線咩??

點打?好簡單，除左繼續簽有關嘅聯署之外，我地都可以send email俾美國嘅相關人士，小弟英文麻麻地但都幫手打左範本分兼且已經send左出去俾唔同人士，內容如下﹕

Recently, the evil CCP has expelled journalists from US newspapers in retaliation for restrictions on its news outlets in the US. Similar cases have been occurred before but this time, the difference is China also prohibited the newspapers’ journalists from working in HK. This action is completely violating the Basic Law.

The Foreign Ministry Spokesperson of the CCP, Geng Shuang claimed that the prohibition of the US journalists in HK is a kind of external affairs. In fact, according to article 13 of the Basic Law: The Central People’s Government authorizes the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region to conduct relevant external affairs on its own in accordance with this Law. On the other hand, article 27 stated that ‘Hong Kong residents shall have freedom of speech, of the press and of publication’. So, allowing journalists from the US to work in HK should be under the control of HK government (authorized by the Chinese government). Hence, the prohibition action taken by the CCP recently is a kind of violation of the Basic Law.

The Basic Law was drafted on the basis of the Sino-British Joint Declaration signed between the Chinese and British governments in 1984 with the principle ‘One Country, Two System’. The Basic Law acts as an evidence that HK has a high degree of autonomy and enjoys high extend of freedom against the Chinese government. Now, the evil CCP violates the Basic Law indicated that ‘One country, Two System’ is no longer valid, taking the freedom of press away from Hong Kong people implies other freedom protected by the Basic Law will soon be taken away from the CCP also.

The United States-Hong Kong Policy Act is maintained base on how autonomous Hong Kong has, with the anti-extradition protests occurred since June 2019 and the recent action of the Chinese government, it is obvious that Hong Kong does not have autonomy anymore. I am here to urge the US government to take serious consideration to modify or even terminate the Hong Kong Policy Act in order to avoid any infiltration by the evil CCP to the United States in the use of Hong Kong. It is acceptable to make any changes of Hong Kong Policy Act if the whole world could see that Hong Kong becomes less autonomous. On the order hand, to restore the autonomy of Hong Kong, only universal suffrage can help. With the universal suffrage of Legislative Council and the Chief Executive of HK, we can have politicians that really serve the Hong Kong society but not the evil Chinese government. ‘One Country, Two System’ is simply a lie, so the world no need to treat us as a difference region with China, any special status or arrangements to HK should be cancelled.

At last, I hope the US government can treat the prohibition of the press to work in HK as a serious international incident. It indicated that Hong Kong is in a serious condition that the Basic Law is invalid, please take action to save HK and fight against the Chinazi.

Free Hong Kong
Revolution of our time
A HK Citizen

以上只係小弟嘅Template，如果大家覺得表達唔到你地想講嘅野，麻煩大家自己修改喇不過由於Mitch McConnell同好似Rubio定唔記得邊個，佢地有字數限制，要o係3000個字母之內，所以大家自己打email嘅時候就留意字母數(我上面個template就29xx啱啱好)
當然唔一定有用，但大家記得美國會o係黎緊5月前發表香港人權及民主法認證報告，咁我地有咁好嘅話題，梗係要大大聲、一人一email講俾美國知﹕一國兩制已死，我要真普選！

我send左俾下列嘅人士，各位都可以send俾下面以外嘅相關人士，等多d人圍攻中共﹕
Ted Cruz : https://www.cruz.senate.gov/?p=form&id=16
白宮﹕https://www.whitehouse.gov/contact/
美國國務院(啫係Pompeo)﹕https://register.state.gov/contactus/ContactUsForm
Nancy Pelosi﹕https://www.speaker.gov/contact
Marco Rubio﹕https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm/contact
Mitch McConnell﹕https://www.mcconnell.senate.gov/public/index.cfm/contactform

希望大家可以助我一臂之力
一齊圍屌中共！

光復香港！
時代革命！
有冇人幫推呀！
直接要求取消獨立關稅區

quote.msg: 直接要求取消獨立關稅區

replies.msg:
啱呀！攬炒！
一人一封去信美國！

如果有send到俾白宮嘅手足可能會收到下面呢個回信﹕

既然回信都提醒我應該要send去Bureau of East Asian and Pacific Affairs
(啫係美國國務院東亞暨太平洋事務局)
咁我地梗係要做野啦
我搵過EAP Bureau嘅聯絡方法主要係Twitter，啫係佢冇email address
咁有打開Twitter戰線嘅手足(包括小弟本人)就記得將成段訊息tweet佢或者msg佢喇

Link: https://twitter.com/USAsiaPacific
(入到去再睇大家想TWEET佢定私訊佢)
